channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chubby Checker, Phish and Outkast Among Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Nominees
item.description: Billy Idol, the Black Crowes and Maná will also appear on the ballot for the first time, alongside Oasis, Joe Cocker, Mariah Carey and others.

item.title: More Power for Elon Musk, and the Risk of Lithium-Ion Batteries
item.description: Plus, who isn’t in the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame.

item.title: How Escalating Violence Is Upending Lives in the West Bank
item.description: Since Oct. 7, 2023, Israeli military raids in areas dominated by Palestinian militants in the West Bank have increased, often leaving civilians with l...

item.title: Sam Altman says there has been a ‘vibe shift’ in Silicon Valley’s relationship with Washington under Donald Trump
item.description: Sam Altman, along with several other major tech leaders, has embraced the new administration and its tech-friendly policies.

item.title: The Fiercest Fighting of the Ukraine War May Be in Russia
item.description: The Times interviewed Russian soldiers who said they face a brutal fight to dislodge determined Ukrainian forces from a sliver of Russian land. Trappe...

item.title: Kremlin Says U.S. Will Release a Russian in American Custody
item.description: Moscow said a Russian imprisoned in the U.S. would be freed “in the coming days” after the release of an American schoolteacher.

item.title: Kremlin Says U.S. Will Release a Russian in American Custody
item.description: Moscow said a Russian imprisoned in the U.S. would be freed “in the coming days” after the release of an American schoolteacher.

item.title: Baidu CEO defends heavy AI investments as competition heats up and Apple reportedly looks elsewhere
item.description: "When technology still evolves at such a rapid rate, you just cannot stop investing," CEO Robin Li said in Dubai on Tuesday.

item.title: Musk appears alongside Trump in the White House to admit mistakes will happen in DOGE’s major government reform: ‘Nobody is going to bat 1,000’
item.description: Elon Musk admitted he won't be correct 100% of the time in his work at DOGE, after being questioned if his team had mistakenly said $50m in condoms we...

item.title: Top U.S. Amazon sellers are furious about the ‘avalanche’ of Chinese competitors—and they crave a Trump intervention
item.description: The billionaire investor Mark Cuban also told Fortune that the state of competition on Amazon is “a huge problem for small companies."
